name: 伊莱沙·格雷
bio_short: 美国电气工程师和发明家。他是“电话”的共同发明人之一，在1876年与贝尔（Bell）在“同一天”提交了专利文件（`elisha_gray_1876`），但以几小时之差败诉。他后来共同创立了“西电制造公司”(Western Electric)。
bio_short_en: An American electrical engineer and inventor. He was a co-inventor of the telephone, famously filing a patent caveat for his design on the *same day* as Alexander Graham Bell in 1876 (`elisha_gray_1876`), losing the patent by a matter of hours. He later co-founded the Western Electric Company.
